references.paper_title: BMRS: Bayesian Model Reduction for Structured Pruning
references.reason: This is the main reference as it is the current paper.

references.paper_title: Variational Dropout and the Local Reparameterization Trick
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of multiplicative noise, a key component of BMRS.
This paper introduces Bayesian Model Reduction (BMR), which is a core methodology of BMRS.

references.paper_title: Structured Bayesian Pruning via Log-Normal Multiplicative Noise
references.reason: This paper introduces Bayesian structured pruning with multiplicative noise, a key component of BMRS.
This is a foundational paper in neural network pruning, providing context and historical background to the field.
